data.why:
Device::Modem::MsgModem, a module to allow access to the voicemail
    and fax features of the USRobotics Message Modem, including the
    ability to query the modem and download messages and faxes.

    Device::Modem::MsgModem is built on top of the existing
    Device::Modem module and provides all the features of Device::Modem
    and additional functionality to handle the messaging features of the
    USR Message Modem.
